ing: 2/3 cup Craisins (sweetened, dried cranberries) or raisins, microwaved in
1 pinch Salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
des: "To boost flavor and nutrition, prepare the whole-grain couscous with orange juice instead of water."
ins: Prepare couscous according to package directions. Combine all ingredients; toss. Serve at room temperature or chilled.
